items.title: Ex-NASCAR driver Biffle, family die in plane crash
items.description: Former NASCAR driver Greg Biffle and his family were among seven people killed in a plane crash Thursday in Statesville, North Carolina.

items.title: Jokic breaks record for career assists by center
items.description: Nikola Jokic passed Kareem Abdul-Jabbar as the NBA's career assists leader among centers in Thursday's win over the Magic.
